Actions.ActionName: Copy the selected Macro as Image
Adjust the image for Retina displays, if needed

ThenActions.ActionName: Get Image Pixel Size of Clipboard into 'kmfamImageSize'

Actions.ActionName: Get Image Pixel Size of Clipboard into 'kmfamImageSize'

ElseActions.ActionName: Crop Image for normal displays, so we don't end up shrinking too small

Actions.ActionName: Write the image from the Clipboard to the file specified in TriggerValue
